Patients definite diagnosis chronic pain syndrome , psychiatric disorder , drug abuse ( include opioids , NSAIDs , sedatives , antidepressant ) 2 . Intraoperative fentanyl use > 3 Î¼g/kg 3 . Patients definite diagnosis esophageal reflux syndrome 4 . Use sedatives , antiemetic , antipruritic within 24 hour operation 5 . Surgery > 4 hour laparoscopy surgery
